# Flow 1

# 1. Signup user 1
mutation signup {
  createUser(
    user: {
      username: "user1"
      password: "user1"
      first_name: "user"
      last_name: "1",
      date_of_birth: "2000-01-01",
      bio: "student fmi",
    }
  ) {
    user_id
    username
    first_name
    last_name
    date_of_birth
    bio
    profile_picture
  }
}

# 2. Login user 1
mutation login {
  login(username: "user1", password: "user1") {
    token
  }
}

# 3. Upload profile picture 
mutation profile_picture {
  uploadProfilePicture(userImage: {
    user_id: 1,
    profile_picture_blob: "data:image/png;base64,"
  }){
    user_id 
    profile_picture_path
  }
}

# 4. Create a post
mutation create_post {
  createPost(post: {
    user_id: 1,
    text: "I love fmi <4"
  }) {
    post_id
    user_id
    parent_post_id
    text
    timestamp
    no_likes
    no_bookmarks
    no_reposts
  }
}

# 5. Reply to a post
mutation reply_to_post {
  createPost(post: {
    user_id: 1,
    parent_post_id: 1,
    text: "Famous last words.."
  }) {
    post_id
    user_id
    parent_post_id
    text
    timestamp
    no_likes
    no_bookmarks
    no_reposts
  }
}
